title: ‘Fraudsters tricked my elderly father out of £30k – then threatened to pay him a visit’
text:
Has a company treated you unfairly? Our consumer champion, Katie Morley, is here to help. For how to contact her click here.

Dear Katie,

I am writing on behalf of my father, an elderly pensioner who lives alone and suffers from mobility and anxiety issues. He has been a loyal customer of Barclays for 50 years, but the bank has badly let him down.

Back in June, he took phone calls from a man purporting to be from TalkTalk, asking him for help in stopping a group of 24 innocent victims being extorted by fraudsters. My father believed the calls were genuine and gladly offered his assistance. But the sad truth was that he himself was being fooled.

He was instructed to go into his bank branch...
description: Has a company treated you unfairly?
